name: A Mazing Trace
description:
Github Repo

The zipped release file should run on windows computers using and oculus rift or a quest in link mode.

Pretty basic game, playing with spatial memory which i thought would be interesting in vr. Basically the player has to remember where flags are in the enviroment and then navigate over and place a marker where they think the flags are.  Scores are calculated based on the distance from the actual location. Player stats are saved per level, and getting a high score allows you to advance to the next level.

Assets used:

Unity XR interaction toolkit

Cartoon Anime Stylized HDRI skybox pack [FREE]

PBR Textures from freepbr.com [FREE]
